La_Crosse.University of Wisconsin\u2013La Crosse: The University of Wisconsin-La Crosse (also known as UW-La Crosse, UWL, or informally UWLAX) is located in La Crosse, Wisconsin United States. Founded in 1909, it is a leading comprehensive four-year institution within the University of Wisconsin System awarding bachelor's, master's, and two doctoral degrees. UW-La Crosse is organized into five schools and colleges offering 94 undergraduate programs and 21 graduate programs.
